items.name: Teeny weenie balance bike
items.longDescription: James is 1 and a half around Christmas - and it'd be good if it was a size he could use immediately or in the next month or two.

items.name: BT6000 Video Baby Monitor
items.shortDescription: James would like this so his parents are extra good at checking on him.

items.name: Animal posters for his room
items.shortDescription: James loves dogs and ducks - common often seen animals would be welcome
items.longDescription: Please no detailed posters about duckbilled platypuses or komodo dragons til he's older

items.name: Edelrid Fraggle XXS Climbing harness
items.longDescription: It's entirely possible that James won't fit into this for some months, but he'd like it so he can one day go near heights in caves and near cliffs.

items.name: Small buoyancy aid for swimming
items.longDescription: It's entirely possible that James use this for a while, but he'd like it so he can one day go near water and on boats.

items.name: Oranges
items.longDescription: James loves clementines and satsumas and can get into them by himself. He would love gifts of orange!

items.name: Flyaway footballs
items.shortDescription: does not have to be new! All balls welcome

notes.checkFirst: Feel free to check with Tim and Jen if you have questions.
